title: Blade Runner
plot: In the early twenty-first century, the Tyrell Corporation, during what was called the Nexus phase, developed robots, called "replicants", that were supposed to aid society, the replicants which looked and acted like humans. When the superhuman generation Nexus 6 replicants, used for dangerous off-Earth endeavors, began a mutiny on an off-Earth colony, replicants became illegal on Earth. Police units, called "blade runners", have the job of destroying - or in their parlance "retiring" - any replicant that makes its way back to or created on Earth, with anyone convicted of aiding or assisting a replicant being sentenced to death. It's now November, 2019 in Los Angeles, California. Rick Deckard, a former blade runner, is called out of retirement when four known replicants, most combat models, have made their way back to Earth, with their leader being Roy Batty. One, Leon Kowalski, tried to infiltrate his way into the Tyrell Corporation as an employee, but has since been able to escape. ...
awards: Top Rated Movies #175 | Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 12 wins & 17 nominations.
writers: Hampton Fancher, David Webb Peoples, Philip K. Dick
stars: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young, Edward James Olmos
companies: The Ladd Company, Shaw Brothers, Warner Bros.
languages: English, German, Cantonese, Japanese, Hungarian, Arabic, Korean

similars.title: Blade Runner 2049
similars.plot: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.
similars.stars: Harrison Ford, Ryan Gosling, Ana de Armas

similars.title: Alien
similars.plot: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.
similars.stars: Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt

similars.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
similars.plot: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.
similars.stars: Keir Dullea, Gary Lockwood, William Sylvester

similars.title: Kill Bill: Volume 1
similars.plot: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.
similars.stars: Uma Thurman, David Carradine, Daryl Hannah

similars.title: Aliens
similars.plot: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.
similars.stars: Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Carrie Henn

similars.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
similars.plot: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.
similars.stars: Tom Hardy, Charlize Theron, Nicholas Hoult

similars.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
similars.fullTitle: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
similars.plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.
similars.stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

similars.title: Die Hard
similars.plot: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.
similars.stars: Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia

similars.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
similars.fullTitle: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
similars.plot: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.
similars.stars: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman

similars.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
similars.fullTitle: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
similars.plot: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.
similars.stars: Harrison Ford, Sean Connery, Alison Doody

similars.title: A Clockwork Orange
similars.plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.
similars.stars: Malcolm McDowell, Patrick Magee, Michael Bates

similars.title: Taxi Driver
similars.plot: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.
similars.stars: Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, Cybill Shepherd
